section.p: A vital signs organizer collects vital signs observations.

ol.li: SHALL conform to Result Organizer template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.32)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="CLUSTER" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (6.3.4.21.2)
The vital signs organizer is a cluster of vital signs observations.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="46680005" Vital signs (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (6.3.4.21.5)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (6.3.4.21.7)
The effective time element shall be present to indicate when the measurement was taken.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 HL7ActStatus) (6.3.4.21.6)
The observations have all been completed.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (6.3.4.21.4)
The organizer shall have an <id> element.

Contains at least one [1..*] component, such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Vital Sign (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.14)

Contains exactly one [1..1] author, such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] CDA Author

SHALL satisfy: Contains one or more sources of information. (CONF-387)
A vital signs organizer SHALL contain one or more sources of information, as defined in section Source.
SHALL satisfy: ccd::ResultOrganizer template ID (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.32) is included (6.3.4.21.3)
SHALL conform to Result Organizer template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.32)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="CLUSTER" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (6.3.4.21.2)
The vital signs organizer is a cluster of vital signs observations.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF-394)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (6.3.4.21.4)
The organizer shall have an <id> element.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="46680005" Vital signs (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (6.3.4.21.5)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 HL7ActStatus) (6.3.4.21.6)
The observations have all been completed.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (6.3.4.21.7)
The effective time element shall be present to indicate when the measurement was taken.

Contains at least one [1..*] specimen, such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] CDA Specimen

Contains at least one [1..*] component, such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Vital Sign (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.14)

Contains exactly one [1..1] author, such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] CDA Author

The value for 'code' in a result organizer SHOULD be selected from LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96), and MAY be selected from CPT-4 (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12) or ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20.16 ResultTypeCode STATIC. (CONF-398)
The specimen element SHALL NOT conflict with the specimen inherent in code (CONF-400)
specimen / specimenRole / id SHOULD be set to equal a Procedure / specimen / specimenRole / id to indicate that the Results and the Procedure are referring to the same specimen. (CONF-401)
SHALL satisfy: Contains one or more component (CONF-402)

The target of one or more result organizer component relationships MAY be a procedure, to indicate the means or technique by which a result is obtained, particularly if the means or technique isn't inherent in code or if there is a need to further specialize the code value. (CONF-403)
A result organizer component / procedure MAY be a reference to a procedure described in the Procedure section. (CONF-404)
SHALL satisfy: Contains one or more sources of information. (CONF-406)

SHALL satisfy: Contains one or more sources of information. (CONF-387)
A vital signs organizer SHALL contain one or more sources of information, as defined in section Source.
SHALL satisfy: ccd::ResultOrganizer template ID (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.32) is included (6.3.4.21.3)
